analysis: The project requires Egyptian-themed UI improvements with a light color palette, desert-inspired design, mobile responsiveness, and clean aesthetics. The current files need updates to incorporate Egyptian color schemes, patterns, and ensure all buttons are functional.

improvements.description: Update CSS with Egyptian-themed color palette including sandy beige, warm terracotta, and soft gold accents to reflect desert and ancient Egyptian aesthetics.
Add Egyptian-inspired patterns and textures using SVG data URLs to enhance visual appeal and maintain the theme.
Ensure all buttons have proper event handlers and functionality to improve user interaction and responsiveness.
Implement a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon to enhance usability on mobile devices.
